Just in case you're confused: Volume one (route one) of this series only got one part and then volume 2 (route 2) got 5 parts. Both volumes got the bitch being ditched later on by the guy with the difference is that in the first volume he didn't managed to move on even after xx years and still reminiscing about the past while in the second volume he moved on and now with a family...I think, google translate says so and I just arranged the words to my understanding.
